00000001, 01
00000010, 02
00000011, 03 - 01*1 + 00*2 + 00*3 = 0001
00000011, 03 - 02*1 + 01*2 + 00*3 = 02 + 02 = 0004
00000011, 03 - 03*1 + 02*2 + 01*3 = 03 + 04 + 03 = 000A
00000011, 03 - 03*1 + 03*2 + 02*3 = 03 + 06 + 06 = 000F
00000011, 03 - 03*1 + 03*2 + 03*3 = 03 + 06 + 09 = 0012
00000011, 03 - 03*1 + 03*2 + 03*3 = 03 + 06 + 09 = 0012
...
